_description: This file should be placed at ~/.ai_cli_config.json
_note: All fields are optional. If not specified, defaults will be used.
_default_model_options: sonar-reasoning-pro - Advanced reasoning for complex queries
_default_provider_note: Currently only 'perplexity' is supported. Future: gemini, local
_max_file_size_mb_description: Maximum file size for attachments in MB (default: 10)
_output_format_options: markdown - Rich formatted output with syntax highlighting (default)
plain - Simple text output without formatting
_show_thinking_animation_description: Display animated spinner while waiting for API response (default: true)
